insert.foreach: into TB_CARD_SALES( approval_no, DEAL_DATE, DEAL_TIME, CARD_name, CARD_NUMBER, APPROVAL_AMOUNT, INSTALLMENT_PERIOD, BUSINESS_NO) values(#{item.approvalNo}, #{item.dealDate}, #{item.dealTime}, #{item.cardName}, #{item.cardNumber}, #{item.approvalAmount}, #{item.installmentPeriod}, #{item.businessNo})

mapper.select: select deal_date, deal_time, case when to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 06:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 11:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then 'morning,' when to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 11:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 14:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then 'AFTERNOON1' when to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 14:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 17:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then 'AFTERNOON2' when to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 17:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||' 23:59:59', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then 'EVENING' end as byTime, card_name, visitedCount, customerKind from (SELECT DEAL_DATE, DEAL_TIME, CARD_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, APPROVAL_AMOUNT, BUSINESS_NO, (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER) AS FULLNAME FROM TB_CARD_SALES WHERE DEAL_DATE between 20210715 and 20210716) a, (SELECT (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER) AS FULLNAME, count(*) as visitedCount, DECODE(COUNT(*), 1, '신규고객', '재방문고객') AS customerKind FROM TB_CARD_SALES GROUP BY (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER)) b where A.FULLNAME=B.FULLNAME and BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} order by deal_date

select card_name, approval_amount from(select card_name, sum(approval_amount) as approval_amount from tb_card_sales where deal_date between to_date('20210623', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('20210629','yyyy-mm-dd') and business_no=#{businessNo} group by card_name order by approval_amount desc) where rownum <= 5

select day_before as dayBefore, yesterday, round((yesterday - day_before) / day_before * 100,1)||'%' as dod from (select (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where deal_date ='20210628' and business_no=#{businessNo}) as day_before, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where deal_date ='20210629' and business_no=#{businessNo}) as yesterday from dual)

select last_last_month_sales as lastLastMonthSales, last_month_sales as lastMonthSales, round((last_month_sales - last_last_month_sales) / last_last_month_sales * 100,1)||'%' as mom from (select (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where deal_date between '20210501' and '20210530' and business_no=#{businessNo}) as last_last_month_sales, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where deal_date between '20210531' and '20210629' and business_no=#{businessNo}) as last_month_sales from dual)

select to_char(to_date(deal_date, 'yy/mm/dd'), 'yy-mm-dd') as lastWeek, sum(approval_amount) as lastWeek_sales from tb_card_sales where deal_date between to_date('20210623', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('20210629','yyyy-mm-dd') and business_no=#{businessNo} group by deal_date order by deal_date asc

select deal_date as week_before_last, sum(approval_amount) as week_before_last_sales from tb_card_sales where deal_date between to_date('20210614', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('20210622','yyyy-mm-dd') and business_no=#{businessNo} group by deal_date
select trunc(sum(approval_amount)/ count(*)) as cutomerAverage from TB_CARD_SALES where deal_date = '20210629' and business_no=#{businessNo}

select (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null, 0, sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 06:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 11:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as morning_sale, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 11:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 14:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as AFTERNOON1_sale, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 14:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 17:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as AFTERNOON2_sale, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 17:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210629 23:59:59', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as EVENING_sale from dual

select (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null, 0, sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 06:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 11:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as morning_sale, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 11:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 14:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as AFTERNOON1_sale, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 14:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 17:00:00', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as AFTERNOON12_sale, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where to_TIMESTAMP(deal_date||deal_time, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 17:00:01', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_TIMESTAMP('20210628 23:59:59', 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and business_no =#{businessNo}) as EVENING_sale from dual

select chk as customer_kind, sum(customer_count) as customer_count, sum(approvalSum) as customer_sale from(SELECT DEAL_DATE, CARD_NAME, COUNT(APPROVAL_AMOUNT) as customer_count, SUM(APPROVAL_AMOUNT) as approvalSum, CHK FROM ( SELECT A.DEAL_DATE, A.DEAL_TIME, A.CARD_NAME, A.CARD_NUMBER, A.APPROVAL_AMOUNT, A.BUSINESS_NO, B.CHK FROM (SELECT DEAL_DATE, DEAL_TIME, CARD_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, APPROVAL_AMOUNT, BUSINESS_NO, (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER) AS FULLNAME FROM TB_CARD_SALES WHERE DEAL_DATE='20210629' and business_no ='6052355236') A, (SELECT (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER) AS FULLNAME, DECODE(COUNT(*), 1, '신규고객', '재방문고객') AS CHK FROM TB_CARD_SALES where business_no =#{businessNo} GROUP BY (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER)) B WHERE A.FULLNAME=B.FULLNAME ) GROUP BY DEAL_DATE, CARD_NAME, CHK) group by chk

select chk as customer_kind, sum(customer_count) as customer_count, sum(approvalSum) as customer_sale from(SELECT DEAL_DATE, CARD_NAME, COUNT(APPROVAL_AMOUNT) as customer_count, SUM(APPROVAL_AMOUNT) as approvalSum, CHK FROM ( SELECT A.DEAL_DATE, A.DEAL_TIME, A.CARD_NAME, A.CARD_NUMBER, A.APPROVAL_AMOUNT, A.BUSINESS_NO, B.CHK FROM (SELECT DEAL_DATE, DEAL_TIME, CARD_NAME, CARD_NUMBER, APPROVAL_AMOUNT, BUSINESS_NO, (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER) AS FULLNAME FROM TB_CARD_SALES WHERE deal_date between to_date('20210623', 'yy/mm/dd') and to_date('20210629','yy/mm/dd') and business_no =#{businessNo}) A, (SELECT (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER) AS FULLNAME, DECODE(COUNT(*), 1, '신규고객', '재방문고객') AS CHK FROM TB_CARD_SALES where business_no =#{businessNo} GROUP BY (CARD_NAME||CARD_NUMBER)) B WHERE A.FULLNAME=B.FULLNAME ) GROUP BY DEAL_DATE, CARD_NAME, CHK) group by chk

select receipt_code as receipt_name, sum(calsum) as recent_week_sum, count(*) as count from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629') group by receipt_code order by recent_week_sum desc

select receipt_date, sum(calSum) as sum from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, to_char(to_date(receipt_date,'yy/mm/dd'),'yy-mm-dd') as receipt_date , SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, division from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, to_char(to_date(receipt_date,'yy/mm/dd'),'yy-mm-dd') as receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, division from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629') group by receipt_date order by receipt_date asc

select receipt_date, sum(calSum) as sum from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, to_char(to_date(receipt_date,'yy/mm/dd'),'yy-mm-dd') as receipt_date , SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, division from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210616' and '20210622' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, to_char(to_date(receipt_date,'yy/mm/dd'),'yy-mm-dd') as receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, division from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210616' and '20210622') group by receipt_date order by receipt_date asc

select receipt_code as receipt_name, sum(calsum) as recent_month_sum, count(*) as count from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210531' and '20210629' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210531' and '20210629') group by receipt_code order by recent_month_sum desc
select deduction, sum(sum) as sum, count(*) as count from tb_purchase where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629' group by deduction

select store_name, sum from(select store_name, sum(amount) as sum from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210531' and '20210629' group by store_name) where rownum <= 3

select sum(recent_week_sum) as recent_week_sum, sum(count) as week_purchase_count from (select receipt_code as receipt_name, sum(calsum) as recent_week_sum, count(*) as count from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO='6052355236' and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210623' and '20210629') group by receipt_code)

select sum(recent_week_sum) as two_week_sum, sum(count) as two_week_purchase_count from (select receipt_code as receipt_name, sum(calsum) as recent_week_sum, count(*) as count from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO='6052355236' and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210616' and '20210622' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210616' and '20210622') group by receipt_code)
select phone,store_name, b.business_no from tb_user a, tb_business b where a.user_id = b.user_id and agreement= 'Y'

select day_before as dayBeforeSum, yesterday as yesterdaySum from (select (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where deal_date = to_date(#{dayBefore}, 'yyyymmdd') and business_no=#{businessNo}) as day_before, (select decode(sum(approval_amount),null,0,sum(approval_amount)) from tb_card_sales where deal_date = to_date(#{yesterday}, 'yyyymmdd') and business_no=#{businessNo}) as yesterday from dual)
